name: 22/23 Y1C - Team 5 (Suzuki) - VampUP
description:
You're Dr. Michael, constantly thirsting for blood. Every second you don't dash through hazardous hemoglobin patches or reach checkpoints, you lose health. Utilize the traversal mechanics to reach the end of the level before running out!

Install Instructions:

1. Click on the download button. 

2. Select Unzip files 

3. Launch the game and have fun! 

Controls:

Move left/ RightLeft Joystick(A/D)JumpBottom Face Button(Space)DashLeft Face Button/RB/LB(Shift)Return to HubController Special Buttons(0)Exit Game-(Esc)
